prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon that embodies nature with green leaves and white fur.
I want a legendary Pokemon with floral features and elegant wings that can soar through the skies.
Generate a small, grass-type Pokemon with vibrant colors and a playful personality.
Make a whimsical creature that can blend into its forest surroundings with stunning floral accents.
Imagine a Pokemon that can heal nature, featuring green and pink colors with a cute expression.
Design a tiny mythical creature known for its ability to bring flowers and life to barren lands.
Show me a unique Pokemon that represents spring with bright colors and a gentle demeanor.
